moves.1. g4 d5 2. Bg2: Sacrificing the pawn is white's best course of action.
moves.2... c5: Not interested. Black gets in hot water after ...Bxg4, c4! c6, cxd5 cxd5, Qh4+!
moves.4... Nc6 5. Ne2 a6: !? There was no threat of a piece on b5.
moves.7... b6 8. c4: The attack is on. The kingside will have to wait for now.
moves.15... Rc8 16. Nc4: ? This looks clever but Qxc5 takes care of it.
moves.16... Qc7: ?? Now I can hop back into the driver's seat.
moves.18... O-O: Ne4 would have saved some things.
Ra1 is passive and allows black to take control of the c-file.
moves.35. Rb2: The pawn is stuck on a light square.
